Name: Repealing the call up provision following the granting of base station licenses.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the call up provision following the granting of base station licenses.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Section 19-511.1 of chapter 5 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby REPEALED.
	Â§ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS# 3462
SH/LF
6/29/12
